utter_faq/guidebook.text:
The FCSIT Academic Guidebook contains latest up to date information:
Link to guidebook: https://www.fcsit.unimas.my/images/2023/undergraduate/guidebook2023-4.pdf

utter_faq/academic_forms.text: For filling in forms or request, navigate to InAFS as the central hub for students to fill in academic forms: https://inafs.ia.unimas.my/#/login

utter_faq/registration.text:
The links to semester and course registration are:
Semester Registration: https://estudent.unimas.my/SemesterRegistration/
Course Registration: https://smpweb.unimas.my/CourseRegistration/

utter_faq/academic_calender.text: The semester's academic calender can be found at: https://www.bpps.unimas.my/academic-calendar

utter_faq/course_timetable.text:
You can view your course timetable and location of your classes by logging in to https://smpweb.unimas.my/eStudent/ -> Schedule -> Class Schedule
Alternatively, you can open your UNIMAS Now App -> click on second tab of the menu -> Timetable

utter_faq/facilities.text: Information regarding facilities and lab rooms in FCSIT are available here: https://www.fcsit.unimas.my/my-fcsit/facilities

utter_faq/firstclass.text:
CGPA for First Class Honours is around 3.75
While GPA for Dean List award will be 3.5

utter_faq/lecturer.text: Information regarding lecturers of the faculty can be found here: https://www.fcsit.unimas.my/home/people

utter_faq/evaluation.text: Course evaluation form can be filled from this link: https://sppweb.unimas.my/myform/evaluation

utter_faq/results.text: Results and grades for the semester can be viewed from this link: https://smpweb.unimas.my/eStudent/academicinfo/result *Note that results can only be viewed within announced timeframe*

utter_faq/date_register.text: The opening and closing date for semester and course registration can be found posted here: https://www.bpps.unimas.my/important-news

utter_faq/academic_advisor.text: Your academic advisor information can be found at: https://smpweb.unimas.my/eStudent/academicinfo/advisor

utter_faq/exam_slip.text:
Examination slip can be accessed through this link: https://smpweb.unimas.my/eStudent/print/examslip
But several steps have to be done before exam slip can be printed:
- Contact and meet your academic advisor
- Complete your course evaluation
